 * Annotation of the whole document
 * Annotation of a protein in the document
 
== Annotation of the whole document ==

=== Example 1 ===
{{{
    <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://my.example.org/annotation/1">
    	<rdf:type rdf:resource="Annotation"/>
    	<annotation:annotates rdf:resource="http://www.paolociccarese.info"/>
    	<pav:createdBy rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
    	<annotation:hasTopic rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
    </rdf:Description> 
}}}

=== Example 2 ===
{{{
    <rdf:Description rdf:about="http://my.example.org/annotation/2">
    	<rdf:type rdf:resource="Annotation"/>
    	<annotation:annotates rdf:resource="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amyloid_precursor_protein"/>
    	<pav:createdBy rdf:resource="http://www.hcklab.org/foaf.rdf#me"/>
    	<annotation:hasTopic rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/PRO_000004168"/>
    </rdf:Description> 
}}}

=== Annotation of a protein in the document ===
